Nor could the worlds best spirits so much erre,</br>If death tooke all, that they should all agree,</br>Before this life their honor to preferre;</br>For what is praise to things that nothing bee?
Againe, if by the bodies prop she stand,</br>If on the bodies life, her life depend,</br>As Meleagers on the fatall brand,</br>The bodies good she onely would intend.

We should not fine her halfe so brave and bold,</br>To leade it to the warres, and to the Seas;</br>To make it suffer watchings, hunger, cold,</br>When it might feed with plenty, rest with ease.....</br>
